tag_list: istanbul, turkey, developer, ux, ui, saas, apsiyon
overview: Meric Akdamar, was born in 1980 in Istanbul. While studying in Ankara University, Astronomy and Space Science, worked in Office of IT Department of Ankara University and in the EU Office. Gratuated in 2007 and started working in Mikro Yazilimevi A.S. in Istanbul. Worked in web applications and B2B projects. After my military service returned to his job in Mikro. Then started developing Apsiyon in 2010. He profession is web applications with C# and JAVA technologies and expert in relational database applications, graphic design, user experience and interface.
